ActEmergency Management Act
Emergency Management Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 100 - which authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the YUKON territory in respect of damage caused by the exceptional flooding that affected the Yukon (Marsh Lake, Tagish, Carcross and Lake Laberge were particularly affected) during the spring and summer 2007.
